title: Activate Point-Of-Sale
description:
A point-of-sale application.
Key features:
 *cooperation with various peripheral devices such as barcode scanners or payment terminals,
 *management of a menu of different sales outlets within a single vendor,
 *offline payment processing.
During the project, among other things, I created a library to share data between devices in the same network using Bonjour protocol and the Couchbase database.
